statusDetails.message: Java 8 date/time type `java.time.LocalDate` not supported by default: add Module "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype:jackson-datatype-jsr310" to enable handling (through reference chain: org.example.models.Booking["bookingdates"]->org.example.models.BookingDates["checkin"])
